text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/expansion-processing-rule defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
all-codes All Codeshe expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) includes all codes; those included in a group and those not included in a group, as well as the codes for the groups themselves (e.g. a parent node in a hierarchical code system).
ungrouped Groups + Ungrouped codesThe expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) includes the codes for the groups, and any codes that are not included in a group.
groups-only Groups OnlyThe expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) only includes the codes for the groups.

concept.definition: he expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) includes all codes; those included in a group and those not included in a group, as well as the codes for the groups themselves (e.g. a parent node in a hierarchical code system).
The expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) includes the codes for the groups, and any codes that are not included in a group.
The expansion (e.g. when in UI mode) only includes the codes for the groups.
